turn.notes: Transition from front-facing to side view

walk.notes: Slow, heavy footsteps - slower than regular goblins

frame_descriptions.0: idle - front-facing stance, massive muscular goblin with golden crown (red gems), tattered purple/red royal cape, large spiked mace held at side, crude iron shoulder plates, imposing posture
frame_descriptions.1: turn - 3/4 angle transitioning to side view, crown and cape visible, weapon raised slightly
frame_descriptions.2: walk1 - side view, left leg forward in heavy stride, cape flowing behind, mace swinging forward, shoulder plates visible
frame_descriptions.3: walk2 - side view, right leg forward, alternate stride, mace swinging back, cape billowing
frame_descriptions.4: death1 - staggering backward from fatal blow, crown tilting off head, eyes wide, mace dropping from grip
frame_descriptions.5: death2 - falling forward, crown flying off to the side, weapon on ground, cape crumpled, arms splayed
frame_descriptions.6: death3 - collapsed face-down, green blood pooling around body, crown nearby on ground, cape spread out
frame_descriptions.7: corpse - dead on ground, large green blood pool, crown lying nearby, scattered armor pieces, mace beside body

visual_traits.build: massive muscular frame, thick arms and legs
visual_traits.weapon: large iron spiked mace or club, dark gray metal
visual_traits.cape: tattered royal cape, purple (#7B1FA2) with red (#C62828) trim
visual_traits.armor: crude iron shoulder plates, dark gray (#424242)
visual_traits.ears: large pointed ears like regular goblin but bigger
visual_traits.teeth: large yellow fangs protruding from lower jaw

design_notes: Should look like a much larger, more imposing version of the regular goblin
Crown indicates royalty - gold with red gems
Cape should be tattered/battle-worn, not pristine
Mace should be oversized and brutal-looking
Armor is crude/primitive, not polished - just iron shoulder plates
Expression should be fierce and angry
Muscles should be visible to show strength
Death sequence should feel impactful - crown flying off is key visual
